thread.title: BRIEF-Allscripts Healthcare Provides Update Regarding Co's Business In Singapore

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Allscripts Healthcare Provides Update Regarding Co's Business In Singapore

organizations.name: brief-allscripts healthcare provides update regarding co

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Allscripts Healthcare Solutions Inc :
* PROVIDING UPDATE IN RESPONSE TO CERTAIN INFORMATION INTRODUCED INTO MARKET ON MARCH 7, REGARDING COâ€™S BUSINESS IN SINGAPORE
* CO RETAINS ENTIRETY OF ITS CURRENT SUNRISE CLIENT BASE IN SINGAPORE - SEC FILING
* WILL ALSO EXPAND FOOTPRINT LATER IN 2018, IMPLEMENTING ALLSCRIPTS SUNRISE AT SENGKANG GENERAL AND COMMUNITY HOSPITALS SYSTEM Source text for Eikon: ( bit.ly/2G6aQiJ ) Further company coverage:
